author: Riley
comment: Great stocks app so far, only problem I have found is the charts. Some stocks display the 1 and 5 day charts correctly, but the 1 month and 1 year charts are blank, other stocks are the exact opposite and only display the month/year charts while the day charts are blank.  Upgraded to five star due to quick response from dev

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: if historical data are not available year chart can't be displayed. Yahoo does not let you access historical prices for every stock.

author: Nicholas D. Quintero
comment: Great easy to read charts and handfuls of information, really complete.

author: J Cook
comment: Have been using this app for a few months now & have found it to be on No 1 stocks app. Comprehensive with helpful developer.
title: Quality app

author: sam s
comment: Great support for android wear and widgets..  It will be great if it can automatically pull my portfolio from Google finance as I do buy and sell stocks a lot.

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: google finance API has been deprecated so will not be integrated since it could stop working anyday

title: cool app exactly what i was looking for

author: bill mitchell
comment: Fantastic app. I have it on both my tablet and phone. It doesn't synch between the two but not a problem as I don't buy dozens of stocks every day. Buy the pro version and support the developer.

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content: Next update will add google drive backup..just backup from phone and restore from tablet.

title: Great app

comment: love the app! the app is beautiful and works flawlessly. the developer listens to you. highly recommend!

author: Stefan Hanrath
comment: Material design, includes widgets, alerts and all of the basics. To top it off, a responsive developer, would recommend!
title: Best on android

author: Jean-Pierre Kruger
comment: The developer listens to the users. Thank you!
title: Excellent app!

author: Ed Strain
comment: After trying the free app, and it worked well I tryed the one for $2.99.  IT NEEDS A LOT OF WORK.  It just would not do what the free one would.   ???

reply.author: Stefano Baldi
reply.content:
if you take the time to read app description, clearly says that it's just ad free. 
No other difference, both have exactly the same functions. Write me to support@webxperience.it your purchase number and i will refund you.

title: Free One Better

comment: Dev works extremely hard to ensure this app is perfect.
title: Relentlessly perfected
